dialog.loading.title: Loading
warning.resS_missing.title: Resource File Missing Warning
warning.resS_missing.message:
Could not find associated .resS file.

This may cause some textures to not load correctly,
and changes may not apply in-game after saving.

Please ensure the related .resS file (e.g., sharedassets*.assets.resS) is in the same folder as the asset file.
warning.texture_load.title: Texture Load Warning
warning.texture_load.reason_assets: This usually happens if the related .resS file is missing or the texture data is corrupted.
warning.texture_load.reason_bundle: This usually happens if the texture data within the bundle file is corrupted or inaccessible.

dialog.about.title: About SPT Asset Editor
dialog.about.text:
{app_name} v{version}

{description}

This program helps view and modify textures within Tarkov-related asset files (.assets, .bundle).

Author: {author}

{copyright}
dialog.about.default.title: About SPT Asset Editor
dialog.about.default.text:
SPT Asset Editor

A tool to extract, preview, modify, and restore textures from .assets and .bundle files in SPT Tarkov game.

© 2025 Golani11
dialog.asset_info.title: Unity Asset Structure Info
dialog.asset_info.text:
Unity Asset File Structure Guide

Assets in Unity games consist of the following files:

  • .assets file: Stores asset metadata and smaller resources.
  • .resS file: Stores larger resource data (mainly textures, audio, etc.).
  • .bundle file: A bundle file containing multiple assets, which can be loaded directly by the game.

Please note the following when modifying texture images:

  • The actual image data for textures is usually stored in the .resS file.
  • Both the .assets file and the related .resS file are needed for texture modifications to apply correctly in the game.
  • Always ensure the related .resS file is in the same folder as the original .assets file.
  • The asset editor automatically finds and copies related .resS files when saving.
  • Bundle files (.bundle) contain all necessary resources and do not require separate .resS files.

Texture load errors often indicate that the related .resS file is missing or corrupted.
dialog.cleanup_temp.title: Cleanup Temporary Files
dialog.cleanup_temp.confirm:
Clean up temporary resource files (.resS) from the backup folder?

This will delete all temporary resource files found in the backup folder.
dialog.cleanup_temp.no_files: No temporary resource files found to delete.
dialog.backup_before_save.title: Backup Before Saving
dialog.backup_before_save.message: Would you like to back up the current state before saving the file?
dialog.backup_path_set.title: Set Backup Path
dialog.backup_path_set.message:
Please select a folder to save backups for this asset file.
A backup file with a timestamp will be created in the specified folder.
dialog.backup_path_select.title: Select Backup Folder
dialog.backup_cancelled.title: Backup Cancelled
dialog.backup_cancelled.message: Backup folder not selected. Save without backup?
dialog.backup_failed_continue.message:
{error_msg}
Continue saving the file without backup?
dialog.ress_copy.title: Copy .resS File?
dialog.ress_copy.message:
Saving to a different folder. Choose how to handle .resS files:

• Select 'Copy' to copy the .resS file(s) from the original folder to the new location.
• Select 'Don't Copy' to save only the .assets file without copying the .resS file(s).
dialog.restore_from_backup.title: Restore from Backup
dialog.restore_from_backup.message:
Restore from the latest backup ({backup_name}) before saving?

Select 'Yes' to restore from the backup file before saving.
Select 'No' to save the currently modified file as is.
live_tarkov_warning.title: Danger: Attempting to Modify Live Tarkov Asset File
live_tarkov_warning.message:
Warning! You are attempting to modify a Live Escape From Tarkov asset file!

This can damage the game client and may be detected by BattlEye anti-cheat,
leading to an account ban.

Modifying Live Tarkov asset files is strongly discouraged.
We are not responsible for any issues that may arise
if you proceed with modifications through other means.
